title: Preseason Question!
body: I was told by a friend that if I made it to gold during preseason, I would still be able to get the ranked rewards for season 6. I'd just to know if this is true because I had just recently gotten gold. thanks!

replies.body:
Your friend was incorrect.  :(

This is not true since Season 6 has **officially ended**. What they may have meant is that any placings or matches you play now, can have a *small impact* on your placements during the 2017 ranked season when it officially starts.

Let me know if you have any questions.
No, this is not true. What rank you reach during the pre-season does not affect the rewards you get for season 6.
